pages.text: There are a number of resources that can be collected, some of them require $(l:crafting/introduction)tools that can be crafted$(), specific $(l:rituals/introduction)rituals$() or $(l:spells/introduction)spells$().$(br2)Some resources themselves are crafted, either through traditional crafting means, or again using the special tools, or gathered from entities using special tools.

In order to gather the specific resource you will need to meet the pre-requisites for doing so.$(br2)For example, obtaining $(l:resources/bark)bark$() requires that you have crafted a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() first, likewise $(l:resources/petals)petals$() need a $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar & pestle$().$(br2)More complex resources will require more complex crafting systems, such as $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() requiring a $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), or $(l:resources/mystic_feather)mystic feathers$() and $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$() requiring $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$().

Regardless of its source, every $(cat:resources)resource entry$() will list how it can be obtained, often times including a detailed template describing the process or providing a link back to the ritual or spell that creates it.
